channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-18611] Avoid memory allocation of aggregation buffer during stats computation
item.description: Bloom filter aggregation buffer may result in allocation of upto ~594MB array which is unnecessary.
item.summary: Avoid memory allocation of aggregation buffer during stats computation

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
